title: Devotee's Mace
content:
by celestial devas, the vanguards of the divine ranks of paradise.

BG3 Devotee's Mace Information

Weapon Enchantment +3. Main Hand OnlyHealing Incense Aura (Class Action) Range: 1.5m

BG3 Devotee's Mace Location & Where to Find

Reach Level 10 with a Cleric, pick Divine Intervention: Arm Thy Servant and cast it to obtain Devotee's mace.

Location: Rewarded from the "Arm Thy Servant" option of Divine Intervention.

Devotee's Mace Notes & Tips for BG3

Rarity: Legendary Value: 640 Gp. Weight: 1.
